items.sentence: I\'m pretty certain that Tom doesn\'t know how to swim.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t want to talk to you.
Are there any more problems we need to deal with today?
Are you sure that it was Tom and not Mary who did that?
Be sure to drop us a line as soon as you get to London.
Tom and Mary got married when they were in their teens.
Tom and Mary sat on the doorstep talking to each other.
Tom asked me who I thought would be the next president.
Tom didn\'t have to tell me why because I already knew.
Tom didn\'t know what time he was supposed to be there.
